allow:
Bash(python3 -c "
import os
import uuid

def gen_id\(\):
    return uuid.uuid4\(\).hex[:24].upper\(\)

# Project identifiers
proj_id = gen_id\(\)
target_id = gen_id\(\)
main_group_id = gen_id\(\)
products_group_id = gen_id\(\)
config_list_id = gen_id\(\)
debug_id = gen_id\(\)
release_id = gen_id\(\)

# Get all Swift files
swift_files = []
for root, dirs, files in os.walk\(''WellnessApp''\):
    for f in files:
        if f.endswith\(''.swift''\):
            path = os.path.join\(root, f\)
            rel = os.path.relpath\(path, ''WellnessApp''\)
            swift_files.append\(\(gen_id\(\), path, rel\)\)

print\(f''Found {len\(swift_files\)} Swift files''\)

# Build file refs
file_refs = ''\\n''.join\([f''\\t\\t\\t{fid} /* {os.path.basename\(rel\)} */ = {{isa = PBXFileReference; lastKnownFileType = sourcecode.swift; path = ""{rel}""; sourceTree = ""<group>""; }};''
    for fid, path, rel in swift_files]\)

# Build section headers
pbx = f''''''// !$*TF8*$!__NEW_LINE_e7abada7c6cee929__
{{
\\tarchiveVersion = 1;
\\tclasses = {{
\\t}};
\\tobjectVersion = 56;
\\tobjects = {{''''''

# PBXBuildFile section
pbx += ''''''
/* Begin PBXBuildFile section */
''''''
for fid, path, rel in swift_files:
    pbx += f''\\t\\t\\t{gen_id\(\)} /* {os.path.basename\(rel\)} in Sources */ = {{isa = PBXBuildFile; fileRef = {fid} /* {os.path.basename\(rel\)} */; }};\\n''

# PBXFileReference section
pbx += ''''''/* End PBXBuildFile section */

/* Begin PBXFileReference section */
''''''
pbx += file_refs
pbx += f''\\t\\t\\t{target_id} /* WellnessApp.app */ = {{isa = PBXFileReference; explicitFileType = wrapper.application; includeInIndex = 0; path = WellnessApp.app; sourceTree = BUILT_PRODUCTS_DIR; }};\\n''
pbx += ''/* End PBXFileReference section */\\n''

# Write to file
os.makedirs\(''WellnessApp.xcodeproj'', exist_ok=True\)
with open\(''WellnessApp.xcodeproj/project.pbxproj'', ''w''\) as f:
    f.write\(pbx\)

print\(''Created project.pbxproj with basic structure''\)
")
